Driving empowering change is my focus in business…

Dynamic Communicator & Savvy Negotiator

I am adept at building reliable teams through leveraging articulate communication and the right strategy. For this reason, I have been steadily promoted to progressively challenging roles.

I am always on the lookout for fueling new business opportunities for capital funding and establishing a long-range outlook with sound financial planning. To improve productivity and compliance, I deploy solid financial controls and processes while successfully leading and passing all audits. 
I currently lead 3 board appointments. My education is supported by a Bachelor’s degree in Finance along with a CPA credential. I have also completed the comprehensive Turquality Executive Program. With a knack for communicating in multiple languages, I am fluent in Turkish, English, French, and Basic Russian.
